text: And all the men of Israel came together to King Solomon at the feast in the seventh month,8:2 That is, the Feast of Tabernacles (or Booths or Shelters); similarly in verse 65; see Leviticus 23:33â€“36. the month of Ethanim.8:2 Ethanim was the seventh month of the ancient Hebrew lunar calendar, usually occurring within the months of September and October.
